channel.title: YournameScape By Latvian [Updated V4]Tonns of bugfixes~Best starter source!
channel.description:
I'am Back! Now with V4 of Yournamescape source it's fixing Tonns of the V3 Bugs glitches and add somethig new too! Thank's for support guys! In intro i wonted to say when im not really into scripting i doo this when im extremly bored like now :) so i decided to keep my source and make allstar better and better. Offcource it will take some time but i keep fix bugs ewery version. And make all skills work properly not with clicking on objects. ~Latvians
[u]Sorry for bad English and grammar![/u]
[center] [i]V1.0 Updates[/i][/center]
At the point now! what i hawe done? Npc's now hitback (90% done still need work) Fixed 3 dupes (60% Theres still trade dupe i was too slyzy to doo this one) Added New items/removed time counter To well (99% Done) Removed Disturbing Interfaces at login (100% Done) Removed Safe and allstarscape interfaces of the screen,which makes screen look cleaner!(100%) Cleaned up client java (Theres still Tonns of unnecery scripts 30%) P_ring 1639 Added ::wc Added New train area! Informative interface at teleing and skills area at one place (93%) Added New ::fishing (99%) Added Admin/mod Chest protect,if player using cheat client and try steal things hes auto baned (100%) New vengeance emote+gfx (done) New starting area+Outfit (done) Removed all minigames i was planed make new ones in V2 Removed almoust 160 objects
[center][i]V2.0 Updates[/i][/center] 1.New starter Gear 2.Basic crafting system 3.Removed Logs from shops Now only way to get them is ::wc 4.Cleaned Autospawn and client.java 5.Added Easter ring 6.Added ::saveme command automaticly save you 7.Added donator area and chest which is protected by rights 8.Added anti-syi system 9.Added anti-null system 10.New shop zone and updated shops no more nulls 11.New minigame 12.Fixed character face! No more bugged! 13.Fixed Much little Bugs and glitches and i still working to fix them all! 14. Fixed Allstar Cheat client problem! Source works with my client ONLY
[center][i]V3.0 Updates[/i][/center]
1.Fire cape is now from jad only and jad is moved to correct spot,Changed max hit. 2.Corrected little incorect messages 3.Fixed barrows 4.Fixed a disconnect issue 5.Removed few nulls 6.In this version i hardly worked on economy now you hawe to spend your money! 7.Added prayer altars workable with bones just like runescape for dubble prayer xp 8.Added basiacly Herbloring with 3 diffrent herbs, only way to get potions now 9.Added prayer potions 10.Added herblore tutorial 11.Added Amulet crafting system! (magic,defence,strength,power,glory,onyx) 12.skilling now giving point most of the skills is usefull for money making!
[center][u][b]V4.0 Updates[/b][/u][/center]
[b][u][i]1.Added much requested General store 2.New starter gear and started couse last one ruined economy 3.Removed 100% all nulls from shops all shops free of nulls 4.Fixed vengeance glitch 5.New 3rd age zone 6.Added basic runecrafting system with abbys but need work on thati say 30% done 7.Added wilderness agility course and fixed few glitches but still buggy 8.Added glorys with teleport chouses and warning aboute wilderness 9.Cleaned atleast 100+ lines of script but still hundreds of unnececery lines! 10.Fixed tons of glitches but still there hundreds of them. 11.All areas now is "SAFE" wilderness is only in wild now.[/i][/u][/b]
Pictures: [IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/3351/pic0003.png[/img] [IMG]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/7430/pic0001.png[/img] [IMG]http://img573.imageshack.us/img573/6559/pic0000.png[/img] [IMG]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/2023/pic0003t.png[/img] [IMG]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/4729/pic0001e.png[/img] [img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/4417/altarh.jpg[/img] Download and see yourself
[i][b]I'm Not Really into Moparscape again so i won't be able to anwser to your questions! If you got some questions send me message couse i enter this post to update nothig more ~Latvians[/b][/i]
Downloads: Source V4 Mirror #1 - http://www.mediafire.com/?4cv8xu3onsgmmol Source V4 Mirror #2 - http://uppit.com/q5kujgpjcbkt/YournamesScapeV4.rar Source V4 Mirror #3 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=YY6DF2Z6
Client V2 Mirror #1- http://www.megaupload.com/?d=T84UBFU6 Client V2 Mirror #2- http://uppit.com/z0hupl9fpy2v/Client_V2.zip
[b]NOTE[/b]: YOU MUST HAWE CLIENT TO BE ABLE TO CONNECT!
Credits Source V4 Mod allstar - 35% For mading source me 45% for edditing Moparscape 10% For tutorials Other websites 5%
Client V2 Owner nader-50% For client? me 40% For edditing Moparscape 10% For tutorials

item.title: YournameScape By Latvian [Updated V4]Tonns of bugfixes~Best starter source!
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

I’am Back! Now with V4 of Yournamescape source it’s fixing Tonns of the V3 Bugs glitches and add somethig new too! Thank’s for support guys! In intro i wonted to say when im not really into scripting i doo this when im extremly bored like now so i decided to keep my source and make allstar better and better. Offcource it will take some time but i keep fix bugs ewery version. And make all skills work properly not with clicking on objects.
~Latvians

                                               [u]Sorry for bad English and grammar![/u]

                                               [center] [i]V1.0 Updates[/i][/center]

At the point now! what i hawe done?
Npc’s now hitback (90% done still need work)
Fixed 3 dupes (60% Theres still trade dupe i was too slyzy to doo this one)
Added New items/removed time counter To well (99% Done)
Removed Disturbing Interfaces at login (100% Done)
Removed Safe and allstarscape interfaces of the screen,which makes screen look cleaner!(100%)
Cleaned up client java (Theres still Tonns of unnecery scripts 30%)
P_ring 1639
Added ::wc
Added New train area! Informative interface at teleing and skills area at one place (93%)
Added New ::fishing (99%)
Added Admin/mod Chest protect,if player using cheat client and try steal things hes auto baned (100%)
New vengeance emote+gfx (done)
New starting area+Outfit (done)
Removed all minigames i was planed make new ones in V2
Removed almoust 160 objects

                                                [center][i]V2.0 Updates[/i][/center]

1.New starter Gear
2.Basic crafting system
3.Removed Logs from shops Now only way to get them is ::wc
4.Cleaned Autospawn and client.java
5.Added Easter ring
6.Added ::saveme command automaticly save you
7.Added donator area and chest which is protected by rights
8.Added anti-syi system
9.Added anti-null system
10.New shop zone and updated shops no more nulls
11.New minigame
12.Fixed character face! No more bugged!
13.Fixed Much little Bugs and glitches and i still working to fix them all!
14. Fixed Allstar Cheat client problem! Source works with my client ONLY

                              [center][i]V3.0 Updates[/i][/center]

1.Fire cape is now from jad only and jad is moved to correct spot,Changed max hit.
2.Corrected little incorect messages
3.Fixed barrows
4.Fixed a disconnect issue
5.Removed few nulls
6.In this version i hardly worked on economy now you hawe to spend your money!
7.Added prayer altars workable with bones just like runescape for dubble prayer xp
8.Added basiacly Herbloring with 3 diffrent herbs, only way to get potions now
9.Added prayer potions
10.Added herblore tutorial
11.Added Amulet crafting system! (magic,defence,strength,power,glory,onyx)
12.skilling now giving point most of the skills is usefull for money making!

[center]V4.0 Updates[/center]

1.Added much requested General store
2.New starter gear and started couse last one ruined economy
3.Removed 100% all nulls from shops all shops free of nulls
4.Fixed vengeance glitch
5.New 3rd age zone
6.Added basic runecrafting system with abbys but need work on thati say 30% done
7.Added wilderness agility course and fixed few glitches but still buggy
8.Added glorys with teleport chouses and warning aboute wilderness
9.Cleaned atleast 100+ lines of script but still hundreds of unnececery lines!
10.Fixed tons of glitches but still there hundreds of them.
11.All areas now is “SAFE” wilderness is only in wild now.

Pictures:






Download and see yourself

I’m Not Really into Moparscape again so i won’t be able to anwser to your questions! If you got some questions send me message couse i enter this post to update nothig more ~Latvians

NOTE: YOU MUST HAWE CLIENT TO BE ABLE TO CONNECT!
